title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Developing Cognitive Load Measurement Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of cognitive load theory (Intrinsic/Extraneous/Germane Load) and methodology for educational measurement tool development
context.additional_context: Learning methodologies to develop cognitive load measurement tools applicable in language domains for mid-level professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can design cognitive load measurement tools by comparatively analyzing informed rating and na√Øve rating strategies.
Learners can develop an assessment questionnaire that categorizes intrinsic/extraneous/germane load into three levels across 24 learning scenarios.
Learners can explain procedures for validating the reliability and validity of measurement tools using factor analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
